alert.note: Alert for Barber (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 6:44PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Barber County through 715 PM CDT... At 644 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Nashville, or 7 miles northeast of Medicine Lodge, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Barber County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
